spec.determinism: Deterministic given TFPT constants and PDG lepton masses table.
formulas: m_τ/m_μ ≈ M_1(δ)^2,  m_μ/m_e ≈ (M_1(δ)|M_{1/3}(δ)|)^2  (suite convention; see generator)
gaps: Full publication-grade mass derivation requires a unique holonomy/operator selection rule and a quark-mass scheme/scale reference table.
spec.name: Mass spectrum deriver (Mobius/Z3 ratios from δ⋆; lepton ratio checks)
objective: Turn mass-ratio claims into a machine-checkable module (lepton sector first).
Keep scheme-dependence explicit: quark ratios are emitted but not gated (mass scheme/scale matters).
outputs: Mobius-predicted mass hierarchy ratios from δ⋆ (dimensionless)
measured lepton ratios and comparison to predictions
spec.question: Do Mobius/Z3 mass-ratio formulas anchored at δ⋆ reproduce observed lepton hierarchy ratios at the level of order-of-magnitude closure?
validation: Lepton ratio predictions from δ⋆ are within a declared tolerance of PDG ratios (diagnostic gate).
No continuous fit parameters are introduced.
